template_description: Dynamically displays available interfaces based on selected switch

survey_variables.name: switch_name
survey_variables.title: Switch to Query
survey_variables.description: Select the switch to list interfaces for

manual_setup_instructions.step_1: Go to Semaphore UI → Templates → Create Template
manual_setup_instructions.step_3: In Advanced Options → Survey Variables, add:

survey_variable.description: Select the switch to list interfaces for

manual_setup_instructions.step_5: Test by running with different switch selections

expected_output.arista_core: Shows 48 access ports + 2 high-speed ports + management ports
expected_output.cisco_nexus: Shows 48 access ports + gaming zone + trunk ports + management
expected_output.access_switch: Shows 7 access ports + 1 uplink port with current assignments

workflow: 1. Run 'List Switch Interfaces' to see available ports
2. Note the exact port names (e.g., Ethernet1/10)
3. Run 'Switch-Specific VLAN Assignment' with the port names
